trans-unit.source: Type of rotation and flip:

seg-source.mrk: Type of rotation and flip:

target.mrk: Type of rotation and flip:

trans-unit.source: 0 - No rotation and no flipping (A 180-degree rotation, a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip)

seg-source.mrk: 0 - No rotation and no flipping (A 180-degree rotation, a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip)

target.mrk: 0 - No rotation and no flipping (A 180-degree rotation, a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip)

trans-unit.source: 1 - A 90-degree rotation without flipping (A 270-degree rotation, a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip)

seg-source.mrk: 1 - A 90-degree rotation without flipping (A 270-degree rotation, a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip)

target.mrk: 1 - A 90-degree rotation without flipping (A 270-degree rotation, a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip)

trans-unit.source: 2 - A 180-degree rotation without flipping (No rotation, a horizontal flip followed by a vertical flip)

seg-source.mrk: 2 - A 180-degree rotation without flipping (No rotation, a horizontal flip followed by a vertical flip)

target.mrk: 2 - A 180-degree rotation without flipping (No rotation, a horizontal flip followed by a vertical flip)

trans-unit.source: 3 - A 270-degree rotation without flipping (A 90-degree rotation, a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip)

seg-source.mrk: 3 - A 270-degree rotation without flipping (A 90-degree rotation, a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip)

target.mrk: 3 - A 270-degree rotation without flipping (A 90-degree rotation, a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip)

trans-unit.source: 4 - No rotation and a horizontal flip (A 180-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip)

seg-source.mrk: 4 - No rotation and a horizontal flip (A 180-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip)

target.mrk: 4 - No rotation and a horizontal flip (A 180-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip)

trans-unit.source: 5 - A 90-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip (A 270-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip)

seg-source.mrk: 5 - A 90-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip (A 270-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip)

target.mrk: 5 - A 90-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip (A 270-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip)

trans-unit.source: 6 - A 180-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip (No rotation and a vertical flip)

seg-source.mrk: 6 - A 180-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip (No rotation and a vertical flip)

target.mrk: 6 - A 180-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip (No rotation and a vertical flip)

trans-unit.source: 7 - A 270-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip (A 90-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip)

seg-source.mrk: 7 - A 270-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip (A 90-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip)

target.mrk: 7 - A 270-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip (A 90-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip)

trans-unit.source: True.

seg-source.mrk: True.

trans-unit.source: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).
